SELECT cu.name AS c_user_name, cu.phone AS c_user_phone, clc.cycle AS clc_cycle,
FROM c_order co JOIN c_order_lock col ON co.id = col.c_order_id JOIN comm_lock_cycle clc ON col.comm_lock_cycle_id = clc.id JOIN c_user cu ON co.c_user_id = cu.id WHERE co.deleted_at IS NULL AND cu.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT cu.id AS c_user_id, cu.smc_balance AS c_user_smc_balance, cu.available_smc_balance AS c_user_available_smc_balance, co.order_sn, col.quantity, clc.reward AS clc_reward FROM c_order co JOIN c_order_lock col ON co.id = col.c_order_id JOIN comm_lock_cycle clc ON col.comm_lock_cycle_id = clc.id JOIN c_user cu ON co.c_user_id = cu.id WHERE co.deleted_at IS NULL AND cu.deleted_at IS NULL AND co.status = 0 AND (clc.cycle * 24 * 60 * 60 + co.created_at) <= #{timestamp}
